simsim.core
Interface MessageHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
ExtendedMessageHandler, ExtendedMessageHandler, ExtendedMessageHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNode, Node, Node, Node, UnicastRemoteObject
public interface MessageHandler

This interface is used whenever an incoming message arrives at a node. This interface can be extended in order to have the implementing object process specific message types.

Author:
SÃ©rgio Duarte (smd@di.fct.unl.pt)

Method Summary
 void onReceive(EndPoint src, Message m)
          Called to process an incoming asynchronous message.

          Called to process an incoming blocking message.
 void onSendFailure(EndPoint dst, Message m)
          Called when sending a message fails due to the destination endpoint being offline.
 

Method Detail

onSendFailure

void onSendFailure(EndPoint dst,
                   Message m)
Called when sending a message fails due to the destination endpoint being offline.

Parameters:
dst - The endpoint that was targeted.
m - The message that failed to reach the targeted node/endpoint.

onReceive

void onReceive(EndPoint src,
               Message m)
Called to process an incoming asynchronous message.

Parameters:
src - The source endpoint of the message.
m - The incoming message.

onReceive

void onReceive(TcpChannel chn,
               Message m)
Called to process an incoming blocking message.

Parameters:
chn - The channel connection that brought the message and identifies its origin.
m - The incoming message.
